sera.text: Based on your budget, here's a sample action plan for your wedding:
sera.question: Do these steps seem like they would work for you?

plan.goal: Plan a wedding within a $30,000 budget

action.name: Create a guest list and determine the number of guests
action.description: This will help you determine your budget and choose a venue

action.name: Choose a venue that can accommodate your guest list and fits within your budget
action.description: This will help you determine your budget and choose a venue

action.name: Select a caterer and menu that fits within your budget and meets your dietary needs
Choose a photographer and videographer that fits within your budget and has a style you like.
action.description: This will help you determine your budget and choose a venue!

action.name: Select a florist and decor that fits within your budget and matches your wedding theme
Choose a wedding dress and attire for the wedding party that fits within your budget
Select a DJ or band that fits within your budget and plays music you and your guests will enjoy
Plan transportation for you and your guests, if necessary
Create a timeline for the wedding day and coordinate with vendors
Set aside a contingency fund for unexpected expenses
